Package eu.acclimatize.unison.location.harvester

Class HarvesterService

java.lang.Object
eu.acclimatize.unison.location.harvester.HarvesterService
@Service public class HarvesterService extends Object
A service that harvest data from a HARMONIE-AROME end-point.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HarvesterService(LocationRepository locationRepository, DocumentRequestService lrs, Logger logger, DateFormat harmonieDateFormat, Executor executor, HarvestRepository harvestRepository)
    Creates an instance of HarvesterService.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fetchAndStore(Location ownedItem)
    Requests and stores weather data from a HARMONIE-AROME end-point for a given location.
    void
    harvestData()
    Requests, parses, and stores data from a HARMONIE-AROME end-point for locations in the database.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • HarvesterService

      public HarvesterService(LocationRepository locationRepository, DocumentRequestService lrs, Logger logger, DateFormat harmonieDateFormat, Executor executor, HarvestRepository harvestRepository)
      Creates an instance of HarvesterService.
      Parameters:
      locationRepository - The repository that stores the locations that data will be harvested for.
      lrs - The service that is used to obtain XML weather data documents for locations.
      logger - Logs warning messages and exceptions.
      harmonieDateFormat - Used to parse date data using a given time zone.
      executor - Used to execute the data harvesting process on a thread.
      harvestRepository - The repository used for storing harvested data.

  • Method Details

    • harvestData

      public void harvestData()
      Requests, parses, and stores data from a HARMONIE-AROME end-point for locations in the database.

    • fetchAndStore

      @PreAuthorize("#ownedItem.hasOwner(authentication.name)") public void fetchAndStore(Location ownedItem) throws HarvestParseException, HarvestRequestException, DocumentNotFoundException
      Requests and stores weather data from a HARMONIE-AROME end-point for a given location.
      Parameters:
      ownedItem - The location to obtain data for.
      Throws:
      HarvestParseException - Thrown if there was a SAX exception when parsing.
      HarvestRequestException - Thrown if there was an I/O exception when connecting to the URI.
      DocumentNotFoundException - Thrown if there was no XML document found at the URI.
